hooks.prompt:
Before executing the bash command, check if it contains Windows paths (C:\, D:\, backslashes). If so, convert them to bash-compatible format:

For WSL: C:\Users\... → /mnt/c/Users/...
For Git Bash: C:\Users\... → /c/Users/...

Example: cd C:\Users\ngocnv\source\repos\viet-ime\core → cd /mnt/c/Users/ngocnv/source/repos/viet-ime/core

If the command path is in $PWD or already in bash format, keep it as-is.
